title: What is a wireless receiver used for? - Quora

response.answer_text: A wireless system has two key ingredients- 1)transmitter, & 2)receiver. A wireless receiver picks up the signal broadcasted by the wireless transmitter and changes it back into the audio signal. A wireless receiver comes in two non-identical configuration. Single antenna receiver and diversity receiver are two known different configurations. Wireless receiver offers immunity against damage from severe electromagnetic radiation. In other words, the possibility of signal dropout is quite low. Wireless receiver demodulates the signal for effective communication.
